fixed_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 25.0%/26.2%/27.5% of Attack, then deal Curse damage equal to 37.5%/39.4%/41.2% of Attack. This skill can evolve to Frostbite, Tempest, or Malice: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 25.0%/26.2%/27.5% of Attack, then deal Ice, Wind, or Curse damage equal to 101.0%/106.0%/111.1% of Attack.
fixed_skill.name: Killer Allure

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Mabufudyne

innate_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 90.6/99.3/108.0% of Attack. Low chance to deal Curse insta-kill effect to foes with 50% or less HP. Increase chance based on foe's missing HP.
innate_skill.name: Mudoon

innate_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Magarudyne

innate_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 6%.
innate_skill.name: Spell Master IV

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. When using an Ice, Wind, or Curse skill, increase damage dealt by 20% and decrease damage taken by 7% for 2 turns. Also evolve Lilith's unique skill to deal bonus damage for that attribute, greatly increase this skill's damage dealt, and temporarily increase pierce rate by 10%.
passive_skill.name: Allure of the Night

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. When using an Ice, Wind, or Curse skill, increase damage dealt by 30% and decrease damage taken by 7% for 2 turns. Also evolve Lilith's unique skill to deal bonus damage for that attribute, greatly increase this skill's damage dealt, and temporarily increase pierce rate by 10%.
passive_skill.name: Allure of the Night I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. When using an Ice, Wind, or Curse skill, increase damage dealt by 30% and decrease damage taken by 10% for 2 turns. Also evolve Lilith's unique skill to deal bonus damage for that attribute, greatly increase this skill's damage dealt, and temporarily increase pierce rate by 10%.
passive_skill.name: Allure of the Night II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. When using an Ice, Wind, or Curse skill, increase damage dealt by 30% and decrease damage taken by 10% for 2 turns. Also evolve Lilith's unique skill to deal bonus damage for that attribute, greatly increase this skill's damage dealt, and temporarily increase pierce rate by 15%.
passive_skill.name: Allure of the Night III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
